step_feedback.feedback: Your arm and shoulder movements are generally good. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in this step.
Good job stretching your arms overhead. Focus on keeping your elbows a little closer to your body as you stretch back.
You're doing well with the fist-making and squeezing your shoulder blades. Aim for a more consistent elbow position throughout this movement.
Excellent job relaxing and exhaling as you return your arms overhead. Keep your wrists a bit more stable.
Your shoulder and elbow positions are improving. For the next repetitions, try to maintain a more consistent wrist alignment.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your wrists straighter and your elbows more stable during the movements. This will help you get the most out of each repetition.
